summary: Completed testing of URL Redirects and Custom Scripts features for Celora e-commerce platform. All backend API tests pass (15/15). Frontend pages load correctly with proper UI components.

issues: URL Redirects and Custom Scripts links are present but may require scrolling to see on smaller viewports - they appear below SEO link

seed_data_creation: Test redirects created during testing were cleaned up automatically
context_for_next_testing_agent: URL Redirects and Custom Scripts features are fully functional. Backend APIs tested: GET/POST/PUT/DELETE /api/store/redirects, POST /api/store/redirects/bulk, GET/PUT /api/store/custom-scripts. Frontend pages at /merchant/redirects and /merchant/custom-scripts load correctly. Sidebar navigation includes both links under Storefront section.

url_redirects_page.add_redirect_modal: PASS - Modal opens with all form fields
url_redirects_page.import_export_buttons: PASS - Import and Export buttons present

custom_scripts_page.save_button: PASS - Save All Changes button present
custom_scripts_page.tabs: PASS - Tracking Pixels, Custom Scripts, Custom CSS, Templates tabs present
custom_scripts_page.tracking_fields: PASS - Google Analytics, GTM, Facebook, TikTok, Snapchat, Pinterest fields present
